item.title: Australia blames Iran for antisemitic attacks in Sydney and Melbourne
item.description: Australia says it will expel Iran's ambassador after accusing its government of "orchestrating" two attacks last year.

item.title: Trump orders removal of Federal Reserve governor Lisa Cook
item.description: Cook says the US president "has no authority to do so" in defiance of Trump's escalatory move against the central bank.

item.title: South Korea's charm offensive and other takeaways from Trump meeting
item.description: Ahead of Lee's White House visit, anxieties were bubbling in Seoul that the meeting could turn bitter.

item.title: Watch: Moment massive dust storm surges through Arizona
item.description: A thick wall of dark dust was propelled by thunderstorm winds through parts of Arizona's Pinal County.

item.title: Mexico cartel leader 'El Mayo' enters guilty plea
item.description: Ismael "El Mayo" Zambada was arrested in July 2024, and is due to be sentenced in the coming months.
